bibl.title: Genealogy and the Gymnasium. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The size and growth of the gymnasial class. - Gymnasial ancestor duplication. - The non-Oxyrhynchite comparanda. - Anthropology and family history. - Conclusion. - Appendix 1: Oxyrhynchite gymnasial epikriseis; - Appendix 2: Oxyrhynchite gymnasials.
bibl.seg: RUFFINI Giovanni, Genealogy and the Gymnasium. Avec résumé en anglais.

Introduction. - The size and growth of the gymnasial class. - Gymnasial ancestor duplication. - The non-Oxyrhynchite comparanda. - Anthropology and family history. - Conclusion. - Appendix 1: Oxyrhynchite gymnasial epikriseis; - Appendix 2: Oxyrhynchite gymnasials.
